E-Mail Messages
Date: Saturday, 2/1/1983
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
CF John Baugh
in return for
SS Eric Mcinerney, SP James Maniscalco.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Capital City GM



Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1983
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
I think it is time to leave the show. This will
probably be my last year. Just wanted to let you know!

Regards,
Gregory Young



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1983
Subject: Progress of Joseph Clyde
Dear Sir,
Joseph Clyde has nothing more to prove at A Longmont Storm!
He has an ERA of 2.67 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1983
Subject: Progress of Alva Fernandez
Dear Sir,
Alva Fernandez has an ERA of 2.63 at A Longmont Storm!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Robert Dotts
